name: Bullet Boy (itch)
description:
Join B-Boy in his fast-paced adventure through 3 different environments for a total of 9 unique levels. Destroy targets and rush to the end! 

Use your Turbo to improve your speed!

Look out for your Gas-meter, the lower it gets, the slower you become. Be careful not to reach zero . . .

-------------------------------

Part of a personal 2-week limit gamedev challenge

ENJOY!

-------------------------------
